SEARCH
Package com.flipkart.business

Interface StudentInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
StudentOperations
public interface StudentInterface
Interface representing the operations available to a Student. Provides methods to register for courses, view available courses, add or drop courses, and view registered courses.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addCourse(int studentId, int courseId)
    Adds a course to the student's list of registered courses.
    void
    dropCourse(int studentId, int courseId)
    Removes a course from the student's list of registered courses.
    void
    initiateRegistration()
    Initiates the student registration process.
    void
    viewCourses()
    Retrieves and displays the list of available courses.
    void
    viewRegisteredCourses(int studentId)
    Retrieves and displays the list of courses that the student has registered for.

  • Method Details

    • initiateRegistration

      void initiateRegistration()
      Initiates the student registration process. This method should handle any necessary steps to register a new student.

    • viewCourses

      void viewCourses()
      Retrieves and displays the list of available courses. This method should show all courses that the student can choose from.

    • addCourse

      void addCourse(int studentId, int courseId) throws CourseNotFoundException
      Adds a course to the student's list of registered courses.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student registering for the course.
      courseId - The ID of the course the student wants to add.
      Throws:
      CourseNotFoundException - If the specified course does not exist. This method should update the student's registered courses and handle any errors if the course is not found.

    • viewRegisteredCourses

      void viewRegisteredCourses(int studentId)
      Retrieves and displays the list of courses that the student has registered for.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student whose registered courses are being viewed. This method should show all courses that the student has currently registered for.

    • dropCourse

      void dropCourse(int studentId, int courseId)
      Removes a course from the student's list of registered courses.
      Parameters:
      studentId - The ID of the student dropping the course.
      courseId - The ID of the course the student wants to drop. This method should update the student's registered courses and handle the removal of the course.
